channel.title: My Programming Page
channel.description: Discussions about almost anything related to programming!

item.title: Catalan Numbers
item.dc:creator: Sagar Ahire
item.description:
In this post, we will examine the Catalan number sequence and have a look at some of its vast applications in computer science and combinatorics in general. Then we will figure out an efficient way to compute the n th Catalan number.

Read more… (5 min remaining to read)

item.title: Fibonacci Numbers
item.dc:creator: Sagar Ahire
item.description:
In this post, we'll examine the Fibonacci number sequence and deal with the problem of finding the n th Fibonacci number. We'll examine various approaches that steadily increase in efficiency.

Read more… (6 min remaining to read)

item.title: Hello World!
item.dc:creator: Sagar Ahire
item.description:
print("Hello World!")

In true programming tradition, let's begin the journey of this page with a "Hello World" greeting. Hello, I'm Sagar Ahire, and this is my new blog which will discuss stuff related to programming.

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)
